pullrequest.title: Icons and smaller buttons for toolpalette widget

content.raw:
Cool, looking good! (reminds me of the original gtk version)

Our lab's fork is a bit behind at the moment, but I'll try to get it up to date and test these changes out tomorrow to see how it looks with real devices etc and make sure there aren't any obvious issues.
